home.title: Welcome to your cultural cocoon
home.kuriusWelcome: Hello! Ready to explore new horizons? Tell me about a story that transported you!

dialogue.step0_premium: Hello! Ready to create a new memory? First, tell me who you want to share it with.
dialogue.step1: What a beautiful day for an activity! What would you like to do?
dialogue.step2: Excellent choice! Who will be lucky enough to participate?
dialogue.step3_refine: Great! Now, tell me more about what you're looking for. Tell me about genres, themes, or even works you've loved.
dialogue.step4_generate: Perfect! Everything is ready. I'll go find the ideal activity for you...
dialogue.refine_placeholder: Ex: 'A light horror movie', 'A dystopian sci-fi book', 'A comedy series that makes everyone laugh'...
